availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Barnett (Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah J. Renfro Barnett on September 8, 1859. Father of Mary J. Barnett, Francis M. Barnett, and Elizabeth D. Barnett. Farmer in Whitley County, Kentucky, in 1860. Appointed justice of the peace in Whitley County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Spring Rock District, pp. 713.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Whitley C.H. Precinct, p. 334B.
KYR-0001-017-0207
"James Barnett (1832-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #7569239, Accessed August 4, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/7569239/james-barnett.
